roleset.name: cause anxiety, anxious
roleset.note: UNSETTLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'unsettle' based on financial subcorpusand automatic expansion via verbnet; adjectival 'unsettling' based on BOLT-2,3. Member of Vncls amuse-31.1. (from unsettle.01-v)
UNSETTLED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on unsettle.01. (from unsettled.01-j)
UNSETTLING-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from unsettling.01-j)

example.name: unsettle-v: nasty syntax
example.text: What is it, to borrow a term from Coniston, that-1 *trace*-1 so unsettled the market?

example.name: unsettle-v: adjectival/passive
example.text: William Rothe, head of OTC trading at Alex . Brown& Sons, in Baltimore, said program trading is keeping [the markets]-1 unsettled *trace*-1.

example.name: unsettle-v: passivized with instrument
example.text: [John]-1 was sorely unsettled *trace*-1 by Mary's offer of freshly-baked apple pie.
example.arg: by Mary's offer of freshly-baked apple pie

example.name: unsettling-j
example.text: A new report on global warming , the product of a task force of academics , business leaders and politicians , chaired by former Blair administration Transport Minister Stephen Byers and Republican Senator Olympia Snowe , is deeply unsettling .
example.arg: A new report on global warming , the product of a task force of academics , business leaders and politicians , chaired by former Blair administration Transport Minister Stephen Byers and Republican Senator Olympia Snowe ,

example.name: unsettled-j: args0, 1
example.text: I have to admit that deep down I was unsettled about the experience, but I was ignoring my anxiety.

roleset.name: unresolved
roleset.note: UNSETTLED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6, relation to settle.02. (from unsettled.02-j)

example.name: unsettled-j: arg1
example.text: Last year , when the Municipal Soft Environment Office was investigating this case , this illegal real - estate developer ran away , and now , though the case is closed , still the thing is unsettled .

frameset.note: In AMR, 'unsettled' in the sense of 'not settled' should be annotated with the appropriate sense of 'settle'.
